attributes.action: get The Stig from Top Gear to Carry the Olympic Torch in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Being someone who is very proud of the fact that London will be hosting the Olympics in just four years time, I am distinctly underwhelmed at the line-up to carry the Olympic torch on the London leg. Other than Dame Kelly Holmes and Sir Trevor McDonald who do we have? Surely we can find more people who represent the zeitgeist of the nation - especially a man who has famously used the London Transport system so successfully. So, The Stig from Top Gear Should Carry the Olympic Torch in London.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
